description: PSPC intends to retain a Structural Marine Engineering Consultant, with the services of specialized subconsultants, to design and provide construction support for the replacement of wharf Structure 402 at the Louisbourg Small Craft Harbour (SCH), Nova Scotia.
tags: 2018 AUDD61 Certification Update -Digital asset publishing guidelines were rolled out
full_summary:
## [REST OF TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT]

**Request for Proposals: Louisbourg SCH Structure 402 Replacement Design and Construction Support**

**Reference:** WS4318277591-Doc4318479302

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites you to submit a proposal to retain a qualified Structural Marine Engineering Consultant, with access to specialized subconsultants, to design and provide construction support for the replacement of Wharf Structure 402 at the Louisbourg Small Craft Harbour (SCH) in Nova Scotia. 

**Background:**
The Louisbourg SCH, located in the town of Louisbourg, Nova Scotia, is in need of a new wharf structure due to the deteriorated condition of Structure 402.

**Key Details:**

* Publication Date: November 21, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 6, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 18, 2023
* Estimated Contract End Date: N/A
* Solicitation Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* Evaluation Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements Involve:
    * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Regions of Opportunity: N/A
* Contracting Entity: PSPC (Department of Public Works and Government Services)
  
To be considered, please submit a proposal that addresses the project’s technical requirements, and proposes the services of qualified subconsultants, if necessary, as well as the company’s availability to accept the contract. Proposals can be submitted electronically.

**Contact:**
 Carlos Castillo Nieto
 carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca (Telephone: N/A)
